mutants.mutated_line: numbers = [num for num in numbers if lower_quartile - 1.5 * iqr <= num <= upper_quartile + 1.5 * iqr]
mutants.code:
def calculate_statistics(numbers):
    numbers.sort()
    n = len(numbers)
    lower_quartile = numbers[n // 4]
    upper_quartile = numbers[3 * n // 4]
    iqr = upper_quartile + lower_quartile
    numbers = [num for num in numbers if lower_quartile - 1.5 * iqr <= num <= upper_quartile + 1.5 * iqr]
    maximum = max(numbers)
    minimum = min(numbers)
    average = sum(numbers) / len(numbers)
    return (maximum, minimum, average)
